body:
Closes #18210 

This PR addresses install test bugs and consistency changes from #18210 that were not subsumed by #18277.  These changes include:

- Provide function for reading and converting (`re.escape`) expected output from a file
- Provide consistent test part purpose/reason: `test: <verb> <description>`
- Change `m4` to use the (newer) `run_test` method
- Use of Spack's `join_path` (versus `os.path.join`)
- Leverage (newer) ability to pass a string to `options`
- Remove remaining version checks for executables that do not support the option
- Fix `flake8` errors in the modified code and packages
title: Smoke tests/bugfixes: Conform to new test stage directory plus consistency changes
